name: Find the poops!
description:
Find the Poops! is my first Playdate game, made in Pulp.

  • Poop is randomly placed in the room
  • When the player moves close to the Poop, it appears
  • When the player moves to the same tile as the Poop, a message displays how many Poops have been collected thus far
  • A new Poop is placed in the room

Follow along as I continue to document my progress making games for Playdate
